nodes.title: feat(JOML): add JOML API for BatchPropagator (partial migration)
Fix: Make the chunk relevance region iterator actually terminate
perf(optimize): optimize iterator for block region
perf: tweak simplex noise with FMA
Add the dest argument to Chunks.toRelative in ChunkViewCoreImpl
Migrate Omega package from old Jenkins to new, with some minor cleanup / label improvements
doc: add conventional commits to contributing guidelines
feat(JOML): migrate joml to 1.10.0 and 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT for geometry
Fix the upper half of each chunk behaving strangely.
feat(world): add APIs to compute `Chunks` values in-place
Render even chunks that are next to unloaded chunks.
feat(JOML): remove use of termath methods from Material
perf(world): implement `deflate` for sparse TeraArray (8/16 bit)
fix(joml): Fix always growing relevance region
chore(JOML): remove unused imports (Region3i) and update copyright
perf(chunk-sparse-array): replace dense arrays to sparse arrays for lightdata
feat(block/family): add default forwarding to JOML API
feat(JOML): remove deprecated API in favor of JOML for BlockFamily
feat(JOML): remove deprecated methods from OnBlockItemPlaced
feat: Enable extreme render distances using LOD chunks
build(PC): move modules back off the classpath so the sandbox works
chore[IntelliJ]: exclude compiler.xml from version control
fix: remove EntityBuffer from scaled world generation methods
build(PC): remove unused tasks for running headless server from source
fix(ModuleManager): fix improperly-escaped spaces in module path
build(PC): add gradle command-line option for max heap size
perf(GL): move opengl33 off of draw loop
perf: avoid string operations when validating visible blocks
feat(joml): migrate various pieces (no module impact)
build(MTE): allow MTE to configure the logger.
fix(ModuleManger): let loadModulesFromClassPaths load source modules
feat(JOML)!: add JOML API for HUDScreenLayer
